Real Time Clock (RTC)
Peripheral Input/Output
Collaboration diagram for Real Time Clock (RTC):

Detailed Description

The Real Time Clock (RTC) module is an API to access an MCUs integrated real time clock.

More information about accessing peripheral IO is in the Peripheral Input/Output section.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define I_RTC_DISABLEALARM

This request disable the alarm. The ctl argument is NULL.

Example:

ioctl(rtc_fd, I_RTC_DISABLEALARM);
#define I_RTC_GET

This request reads the value of the timer. For example:

rtc_time_t current_time;
ioctl(rtc_fd, I_RTC_GET, &current_time );
#define I_RTC_GETALARM

This request reads the alarm value. The ctl argument is a pointer to memory where the rtc_alarm_t will be stored.

Example:

rtc_alarm_t alarm;
ioctl(rtc_fd, I_RTC_GETALARM, &alarm);
//alarm is populated with the current alarm values
#define I_RTC_SET

This request writes the value of the timer. For example:

rtc_time_t the_time;
ioctl(rtc_fd, I_RTC_SET, &the_time);
#define I_RTC_SETALARM

This request writes the alarm value. The ctl argument is a pointer to an rtc_alarm_t which contains the alarm.

Example:

rtc_alarm_t alarm;
//set alarm members
ioctl(rtc_fd, I_RTC_SETALARM, &alarm);
#define I_RTC_SETCOUNTEVENT

This request controls when the count action is triggered. The ctl argument is a rtc_event_count_t.

ioctl(rtc_fd, I_RTC_SETCOUNTEVENT, (void*)RTC_EVENT_COUNT_SECOND );

Typedef Documentation

typedef hwpl_action_t rtc_action_t

This defines a RTC action.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum rtc_alarm_type_t

This enumerates the valid alarm types.

Enumerator
RTC_ALARM_ONCE 

One time alarm

RTC_ALARM_MINUTE 

Alarm every minute

RTC_ALARM_HOURLY 

Alarm every hour

RTC_ALARM_DAILY 

Daily alarm

RTC_ALARM_WEEKLY 

Weekly alarm

RTC_ALARM_MONTHLY 

Monthly alarm

RTC_ALARM_YEARLY 

Yearly alarm

enum rtc_clock_t

These are the values for clock of rtc_attr_t.

Enumerator
RTC_CLKSRC_EXTERNAL_32768 

External 32.768KHz Crystal

RTC_CLKSRC_INTERNAL_40000 

Internal 40KHz Oscillator

enum rtc_day_of_week_t

This is a list of the valid days of the week.

Enumerator
RTC_DAY_SUNDAY 

Sunday

RTC_DAY_MONDAY 

Monday

RTC_DAY_TUESDAY 

Tuesday

RTC_DAY_WEDNESDAY 

Wednesday

RTC_DAY_THURSDAY 

Thursday

RTC_DAY_FRIDAY 

Friday

RTC_DAY_SATURDAY 

Saturday

enum rtc_event_count_t

This lists the times when the count interrupt can be set.

Enumerator
RTC_EVENT_COUNT_NONE 

Do not interrupt based on the count (default)

RTC_EVENT_COUNT_SECOND 

Interrupt every second

RTC_EVENT_COUNT_MINUTE 

Interrupt every minute

RTC_EVENT_COUNT_HOUR 

Interrupt every hour

RTC_EVENT_COUNT_DAY 

Interrupt every day

RTC_EVENT_COUNT_WEEK 

Interrupt every week

RTC_EVENT_COUNT_MONTH 

Interrupt every month

RTC_EVENT_COUNT_YEAR 

Interrupt every year

enum rtc_event_t

This lists the bit assignments when using the RTC interrupt callback.

enum rtc_mon_t

This is a list of the valid months of the year.
